title: Painting
details: The great artists of the past were aware that human life is full of chaos and suffering. But they had a remedy for this. And the name of that remedy was ‘beauty’.

title: Visual Art
details: Visual arts form of art that focus on creating pieces of work that mainly make use of the visual environment, while trying to convey messages of emotion, ideas or information.

title: Handwriting
details: Handwriting is more connected to the movement of the heart.Hand writing causes thinking - the repetition of writing your goal everyday will increase your awareness.

title: Animation
details: Student who study animation can come from a wide range of subjects. Some students who major in film only discover, through the course of their program, about their passion for animation.

title: Fashion Design
details: While fashion design subjects can seem like a narrow field, composed of only designing and producing apparel-fashion design degrees encompass everything related to fashion industry.

title: Interior Design
details: The design of everything from hospital rooms to malls have been designed with a specific purpose or goal in mind.

title: Music History
details: Music history or historic musicology is one of the most important components of musicology, a discipline that documents the development of musical art and its culture in the course of time.

title: Theater and Dance
details: Theater is an old form of art. Based on the area of fiction known as drama, theater is a complex art that combines different elements that aim to transmit a certain feeling, idea or inner state of audience.
